snippet.title: Super Karate Kid (Free Fan Game // Remake)
snippet.description:
** Available Now! ** https://bit.ly/2P2BnAs
Super Karate Kid is a free fangame developed by yours truly (Merso X). It is remake of the 1987 game "The Karate Kid", which was developed by Atlus and published by LJN for the Nintendo Entertainment System.

Improvements over the original game:
* Updated graphics and sound
* Background and foreground are easier to distinguish from each other.
* Updated controls: designated buttons for jumping and special attacks. You won't enter bonus stages by accident anymore.
* Short invincibility period after getting hit. No more getting sandwiched between two enemies.
* New intro and ending sequences
* Features appearance by arch nemesis Johnny Lawrence

Download the game here: https://bit.ly/2P2BnAs
Patrons get early access to updates and demos! https://www.patreon.com/merso_x 
"Box art" here: https://bit.ly/2QrvEIZ
***********************
https://www.mersoentertainment.com/

***************************
Big thanks to my patrons!!!
Skip Wescott, oldmanwinters, Nielzabub, Paul Brown, Aaron Meredith, James Hollie, The Geek Critique, NintenJoe, Alex Galarza, Bryan Sime, Ezequiel Fuentes Jr, and David Reeder!
